title: Mark Cavendish Cannot Contain The Tears After Trauma of Final Tour de France Mountain Stage
content:
'We came here, we did what we set out to achieve.' Record-breaking sprinter survives time cut on Mount Couillole to all but guarantee he sees the finish of his final Tour de France.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish Cannot Contain The Tears After Trauma of Final Tour de France Mountain Stage on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
